mdRecord.dcterms:title: Spotswood Hotel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Leading hostelry of Ante-Bellum days -- Stood on the site now occupied by the Pace Block.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reunion edition of the Richmond Dispatch, June 30th, 1896 : Virginia welcomes the Veterans
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Richmond Dispatch and The Richmond Times
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reprint edition. Originally published 1896. A compilation of the daily issues of the Richmond Dispatch and the Richmond Times, for June 30-July 3, 1896, issued for the Confederate Veterans Reunion.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Spotswood Hotel (Richmond, Va.)
Architecture -- Virginia -- Richmond; Hotels -- Virginia -- Richmond
Richmond (Va.) -- Hotels, taverns, etc.; Richmond (Va.) -- Buildings, structures, etc.
F234.R52
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Scanned with Epson Expression 10000 XL, using Photoshop CS4, at 8-bit grayscale, 600 ppi.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: James Branch Cabell Library. Special Collections and Archives
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Original periodical illustration: The Spotswood Hotel, Reunion edition of the Richmond Dispatch, June 30th, 1896 : Virginia welcomes the Veterans, 1987, p. 16, Richmond, Virginia Maps and Prints Collection, M 190, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.
